`$=customJS.dv_funcs.mentionedIn(dv)`

##### <s class="topic-title">[[Dysbiosis]]</s>

A reduction in microbial diversity and a combination of the loss of beneficial [[bacteria]].

**See**::
*`$=customJS.dv_funcs.outlinedIn(dv, this)`*
